a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Coal output per worker in the United Kingdom, 1873 to 2019
Average coal output per worker, measured in tonnes per employee per year. The number employed in the coal
industry includes those hired as contractors.
Data source: OWID based on Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy (BEIS)
